body: Hinata may not be useless anymore lol
Like, I get that coloring takes a lot of work. But then don't post an unfinished product. Take your time and post it by the time you're done.
https://members.luscious.net/albums/arashi-no-bouken-colorized-ongoing_338415/ Here is the link to doujinshi it was updated 20 hours ago
I’m just letting everyone know in the comments that on luscious.net you find this same doujinshi there colored with 10 more pages added on it recently updated I will put a link in the comments soon

so zuel the guy that colored it in the comments here said he will be uploading in 10 page chunks. that was a week ago. takes a day to color each page if you put some effort into it. so clearly that was a lie. even if it wasnt you can post more than 10 page chunks. so what i said before doesnt change at all.
either color it all and post it or dont bother. once you finish then post it otherwise its not worth the read at all. so zuel finish the shit then post it all and dont do chunks.
Incomplete garbage needs to GTFOff this site, this is why we have like 99 copies of one fucking book
Looks pretty good, i'll be patiently waiting for the whole thing to be colored
Useless. Now having second thoughts and the police is here
I mean.... he's doing it for free when noone asked so....
but will this one be updated or will there be released another issue?
Hey, it's the colorist here, they didn't carry the full description I put in, I will be coloring all of it, just in 10-page chunks.
Either color it all and post it or dont bother. This laziness is actually starting to piss me off
